/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the sides of the street, indicating a busy day in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is bathed in natural light, suggesting it was taken during the day.
